Class BookList

java.lang.Object
BookList
public class BookList extends Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BookList()
    default constructor initializes head to null

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addToStart(Book b)
    adds a Node with the passed Book object at the start (head) of the list
    void
    commit()
    method commits contents of list in Update_Books.txt file file will permanently include contents after last commit() call is made
    boolean
    delConsecutiveRepeatedRecords()
    method finds all consecutive repeated nodes, each having the same Book record and deletes them
    void
    displayContent()
    method displays records of BookList object one record per line seperated by '==>' last node displays '==> head'
    BookList
    extractAuthList(String aut)
    method searches all records in calling list for Book objects with given author creates new singular circular list that includes only the records of the author
    boolean
    insertBefore(long isbn, Book b)
    method searches list for first occurence of Node holding Book object with ISBN equal to passed isbn value if found, new node will be inserted in the list (holding Book b) before the aforementioned node
    boolean
    insertBetween(long isbn1, long isbn2, Book b)
    method searches list for first occurence of first two consecutive nodes holding Book objects with ISBN values equal to passed isbn1 and isbn2 if found, new node will be inserted in the list (holding Book b) in between the aforementioned nodes
    void
    storeRecordsByYear(int yr)
    finds all book records based on given year and stores them in proper yr.txt file
    boolean
    swap(long isbn1, long isbn2)
    method swaps first pair of nodes of which the first stores a Book record with isbn1 and the second stores Book record with isbn2

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • BookList

      public BookList()
      default constructor initializes head to null

  • Method Details

    • addToStart

      public void addToStart(Book b)
      adds a Node with the passed Book object at the start (head) of the list
      Parameters:
      b - book object

    • storeRecordsByYear

      public void storeRecordsByYear(int yr)
      finds all book records based on given year and stores them in proper yr.txt file
      Parameters:
      yr - year of book record

    • insertBefore

      public boolean insertBefore(long isbn, Book b)
      method searches list for first occurence of Node holding Book object with ISBN equal to passed isbn value if found, new node will be inserted in the list (holding Book b) before the aforementioned node
      Parameters:
      isbn - isbn value of book record
      b - book object
      Returns:
      true if node is found

    • insertBetween

      public boolean insertBetween(long isbn1, long isbn2, Book b)
      method searches list for first occurence of first two consecutive nodes holding Book objects with ISBN values equal to passed isbn1 and isbn2 if found, new node will be inserted in the list (holding Book b) in between the aforementioned nodes
      Parameters:
      isbn1 - first isbn value of book record
      isbn2 - second isbn value of book record
      b - book record
      Returns:
      true if nodes are found

    • displayContent

      public void displayContent()
      method displays records of BookList object one record per line seperated by '==>' last node displays '==> head'

    • delConsecutiveRepeatedRecords

      public boolean delConsecutiveRepeatedRecords()
      method finds all consecutive repeated nodes, each having the same Book record and deletes them
      Returns:
      didDelete

    • extractAuthList

      public BookList extractAuthList(String aut)
      method searches all records in calling list for Book objects with given author creates new singular circular list that includes only the records of the author
      Parameters:
      aut - name of author
      Returns:
      authList

    • swap

      public boolean swap(long isbn1, long isbn2)
      method swaps first pair of nodes of which the first stores a Book record with isbn1 and the second stores Book record with isbn2
      Parameters:
      isbn1 - first isbn value
      isbn2 - seccond isbn value
      Returns:
      true

    • commit

      public void commit()
      method commits contents of list in Update_Books.txt file file will permanently include contents after last commit() call is made
